plan: **Design the dashboard UI/UX** – Create wireframes and prototypes for the dashboard layout, ensuring intuitive navigation and key feature placement.
**Develop the backend infrastructure** – Set up APIs, databases, and authentication systems to support real-time data processing and user management.
**Integrate third-party services** – Connect payment gateways (e.g., Stripe), analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics), and other necessary SaaS integrations.
**Implement security and compliance measures** – Enforce encryption, role-based access control (RBAC), and GDPR/CCPA compliance for data protection.
**Conduct beta testing and gather feedback** – Deploy a limited-release version to a small group of users, collect feedback, and fix critical bugs before the full launch.
